Release Notes: 

    

  NO INSTALL / UNRAR & PLAY /  Updated to Final Version 1.05



 The year is 2008. Citywide blackouts... stock exchange sabotage... electronic 
hijacking of national defense systems... this is information warfare, which has 
become the most dangerous threat to global stability. To prevent these attacks, 
you must infiltrate deep into hostile territory and aggressively collect critical 
intelligence, closer than ever to enemy soldiers. 




Ripped---->Movies , Multi-Player





MORE NOTES:

MAKE SURE YOUR SYSTEM CAN RUN THIS GAME BEFORE DOWNLOADING!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
CHECK REQUIREMENTS AND NOTE YOUR GRAPHICS CARD MUST SUPPORT SHADERS 3.0!!!!

IT DOES NOT MATTER IF YOUR GRAPHICS CARD HAS &#039;8000 GIGS&#039; OF MEMORY,!lol-
You can test and detect proper settings in the games /detection folder
with detectionui_r.exe.





unrar TCSCCT.7z with latest winrar


start with SPLINTERCELL3.EXE in games /system folder

PlaY.


Enjoy this kick ass game.
